content: Would anyone be interesting in relocating Mathlib.Data.List.Prime? It seems it should be under Mathlib.Algebra: it is more about primes than about lists, I think.
The only reason I can think of to keep it there is that, following Gödel, primes are used to encode lists in arithmetic. We can represent the list [a,b,c] as 2^a.succ * 3^b.succ * 5^c.succ.
Yes, actually I wrote a preliminary PR to that move, which was merged, but apparently I dropped the ball when it was merged
